It'll take years to DL. So, how do u know it's fake?

I uploaded this for a friend that has a 2005 model that has lion on it but is not "allowed" to upgrade to ML so i added his model to the alowed list as well as other other machines. the reason it's 9 GB is becaused its uncompressed iso instead of dmg which is encrypted. if this doesnt work for you i can always add your mac number ie mackbook 6,1. however you should do back ups before using this untested build. this was never meant for the public to try. I never thought people would try it.

ill let you know if it works soon on older models apple deems not worthy. it will work on newer models, this was just for the older machines. if you're looking for ML for a newer machine look for a torrent that has more seeds.
